Danielle Lloyd has announced her return to glamour modelling with a bang.

The newlywed previously hung up her lingerie as she took a step back from getting her kit off in glossy shoots - but now she has decided to once again show off her fabulous figure to fans who are willing to pay $19.99 USD a month.

Announcing the news, the former Miss Great Britain took to her Instagram story to entice her followers to subscribe to her saucy OnlyFans account by sharing a sexy photo.

Clad in a fringed bra and tiny black briefs, the bombshell told her followers: "My only fans page is now live! Swipe up to subscribe."

The 35-year-old's bio on the site reads: "Former Miss England, Miss GB and American playboy centre fold.

Love working out keeping my body in shape recently had a Brazilian Bum."

(Image: Instagram)



She finishes: "Any personal requests please DM."

Above the bio is an image of the brunette beauty modelling a tiny black thong and sheer stockings as she poses topless on all fours.

In April Danielle tied the knot with beach-side ceremony in Dubai to Michael O'Neill.

She was previously married to footballer Jamie O'Hara - who she shares sons George, Harry and Archie with.

Danielle recently told how she nearly died when her fake boob exploded.

(Image: Instagram)

She told BBC West Midlands’ Desert Island discs-style show, The Other Side Of: "I woke up the next day in a pool of blood.

“I didn’t know what had gone on, but my breast had burst open in the middle of the night and I had to get rushed to hospital.

“They put me back down into theatre and when they took the implant out they found a blood clot and basically I started to bleed to death."

“I lost six pints of blood and you’ve only got six in your body so I had to have a major transfusion.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

“I didn’t know all this because I was under anaesthetic, but when I came back round I was terrified.”

Danielle says that it was a problem with her self-esteem as much as the pressure of the glamour modelling business that led to her multiple surgeries: “I think I was just looking for something to make me more confident and I do regret that now,” she said.

“But my boobs were my day job and they made me a lot of money.

“I had so many surgeries on my breasts.

“Up, down, big, little, had to have them taken out.”
description: The mother-of-four, who first posed nude in 2006 for Playboy, will give fans access to a gallery of sexy images if they subscribe
